TopicTitle: Is there a Shuttle ET and SRB mod 1.0.2 compatible?

Articles.Content:
long story short: it's for making a Jupiter launcher

i've tried using stock tank and dtobi's tank, but they didn't give me the feel i wanted to make a Jupiter rocket, plus i resize them to 5m parts and the tanks get with too much fuel in them and very heavy...

as for the SRB, i've tried using the one from CSS, and even though it worked, it felt weird, idk why, maybe for the high-attachment of the SRB... i could still use it or use one from KW instead, but i just want to know if there's a mod i've been missing that have them...

I would say the American Pack but the way the engines are laid out is off but looks close or you might check out CMES mod.

EDIT- Also for tanks you might check http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109885-1-0-2-Munar-Industries-Modular-Fuel-Tank-Expansion-%28BETA%29

Edited May 13, 2015 by Mecripp2

Everything you could ever want for an external tank:

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/227356-fuel-tanks-plus

SpaceY has some SRB's, I haven't tried them yet though.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100408

Edited May 13, 2015 by Alshain

long story short: it's for making a Jupiter launcher

i've tried using stock tank and dtobi's tank, but they didn't give me the feel i wanted to make a Jupiter rocket, plus i resize them to 5m parts and the tanks get with too much fuel in them and very heavy...

as for the SRB, i've tried using the one from CSS, and even though it worked, it felt weird, idk why, maybe for the high-attachment of the SRB... i could still use it or use one from KW instead, but i just want to know if there's a mod i've been missing that have them...

I doubt the shuttle parts work however there are parts in this pack specifically for a Jupiter Launcher. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/4116

I would say the American Pack but the way the engines are laid out is off but looks close or you might check out CMES mod.

EDIT- Also for tanks you might check http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109885-1-0-2-Munar-Industries-Modular-Fuel-Tank-Expansion-%28BETA%29

Klockheed Martian SSME engines work with some tweaks, i do have to increase the thrust though...

i've subscribed and been following CMES, haven't tried before, but now that i found it i'm like this: http://anarusche.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/06/tvcachorro.jpg

i've tried munar, and they were the first one i thought, but i've missed the interstage (yep, i'm that detalist, ive got better btw... )

Everything you could ever want for an external tank:

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/227356-fuel-tanks-plus

SpaceY has some SRB's, I haven't tried them yet though.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100408

i'll try them, thanks!

- - - Updated - - -

I doubt the shuttle parts work however there are parts in this pack specifically for a Jupiter Launcher. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/4116

saw that before opening this thread, but checking a few posts it seems to be incompatible with .25, 0.90 and 1.0.2 aswell

Klockheed Martian SSME engines work with some tweaks, i do have to increase the thrust though...

i've subscribed and been following CMES, haven't tried before, but now that i found it i'm like this: http://anarusche.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/06/tvcachorro.jpg

i've tried munar, and they were the first one i thought, but i've missed the interstage (yep, i'm that detalist, ive got better btw... )

i'll try them, thanks!

- - - Updated - - -

saw that before opening this thread, but checking a few posts it seems to be incompatible with .25, 0.90 and 1.0.2 aswell

yea the shuttle parts. Its a parts pack, I cant imagine the engines and srbs not working.

The whole thing needs the bottom node fix so the parts snap together. The tanks should work otherwise. The engines will need adjusted for 1.0 to be right. As for the shuttle itself, it does indeed need more work.

I've got a moderate amount of the updates for it done, but it'll be a while yet

Edited May 14, 2015 by Tiberion
